explainer: The Premier League transfers quiz. A multiple choice quiz with five questions.

questions.question: Mohamed Salah has become Liverpool's record signing but how many Premier League appearances did the Egyptian make for Chelsea?
questions.reveal: He made 13 appearances, scoring two league goals, for Chelsea.

questions.question: Who is Newcastle United's record signing?
questions.reveal: Michael Owen is Newcastle's record signing. They paid around £16 million for the former England striker — a million more than they paid for Alan Shearer.

questions.question: Huddersfield Town's record signing is Christopher Schindler but how much did he cost the newly-promoted side?
questions.reveal: £1.8 million was paid to German side 1860 Munich last summer, for Christopher Schindler.

questions.question: Kevin De Bruyne cost Manchester City £54 million when they signed him from Wolfsburg. How many assists did the Belgian midfielder have in the Premier League last season?
questions.reveal: 18 assists, the most in the Premier League last season.

questions.question: Which Premier League's team's record transfer fee stands at £27 million?
questions.reveal: Crystal Palace's record transfer fee stands at £27 million, Christian Benteke from Liverpool last summer.
